column3: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

column5: Black Hawk Down broke Save the Last Dance's record ($23.4 mil) for the highest Martin Luther King weekend debut.
John Q. broke The Wedding Singer's record ($18.9 mil) for the highest President's Day weekend debut.
Ice Age broke Liar Liar's record ($31.4 mil) for the highest weekend debut in March.
